creator: Lahore New Media Labs
descriptionHtml:
EasyTickets is Pakistan’s top ticketing application, currently having the largest inventory of buses (25 bus operators), 30 cinemas and all major events across the country, officially onboard. All tickets purchased via EasyTickets are digitally paid and instantly digitally delivered with no courier or cash-on-delivery delays. EasyTickets users can not only buy tickets but can also make instant price comparisons through its user-friendly user interface.
A QR code based e-ticket is displayed in the EasyTickets mobile app and also sent via email and SMS to its customers.
Moreover, buying mobile top-ups, paying your utility or education bills, ordering food or booking hotels is no more a hassle when you have EasyTickets in your mobile phone.
• Buy movie tickets, Bus tickets and event tickets
• Buy online movie tickets, online Bus tickets and online event tickets
• View theatre list, now playing movies and check movie show times
• View live seats map and select seat of your choice
• View movie details, trailers, reviews and ratings
• Make price comparisons of all bus services across Pakistan
• Multiple payment options to buy movie tickets including Bank Transfer, Credit Card, Debit Card, all mobile wallets (Omni, EasyPay, JazzCash and SimSIm), all Cash agents (Omni, EasyPay, JazzCash), HBL bank account payments.
You can now make instant price comparisons on your desired routes and buy cheap bus tickets for following bus services instantly with exciting discount offers:
• Daewoo Express Bus Service
